Name: Libertine Comptoir de Cuisine
Review Text:
One of the best "Salad Nicoise" presentations. Love the freshly - and perfectly - poached egg instead of one that's hard boiled!
This beautiful new-ish breakfast and lunch place has euper sweet staff, terrific tunes, lots o'light, and the espresso ain't bad either!

Name: Libertine Comptoir de Cuisine
Review Text: One of my favourite place for coffee and breakfast. Their french toast is served with mascarpone and is very tasty. Itâ€™s a cool and trendy place. Waitress is always kind and sociable.

Name: Libertine Comptoir de Cuisine
Review Text: Great place to eat, not always good to find, but it has an authentic and rough decoration once inside. A nice cafe with a good menu. Help is quick and the food is f good quality and very tastefully. It is known for its sandwiches with sirups. But we tried some meat sandwiches and were very happy!

Name: Libertine Comptoir de Cuisine
Review Text:
Food good for a pic on Instagram
Small food for a quick bite
Friendly staff â€¦

Name: Libertine Comptoir de Cuisine
Review Text: Took 44 minutes to make toast, steak tartare and a poached egg. Portion size is quite small and several people were served before us even though they ordered after us. â€¦

Name: Libertine Comptoir de Cuisine
Review Text: Klein maar fijn. The food we had was tasty. the service poor. The juice served in a mini glas :( when eating there was somebody loudly sneezing at the bar :((

Name: Libertine Comptoir de Cuisine
Review Text: Good service and breakfast, I recommend the eggs benedict! Unfortunately the presentation of the food was not very nice, but maybe some people like this..

Name: Libertine Comptoir de Cuisine
Review Text: I loved the two French toasts (one sweet and the other one saviury) ive chosen.

Name: Libertine Comptoir de Cuisine
Review Text: Food was good unfortunately felt like it was severely overpriced for me. Had the French toast with fruit and paid 6 euros for one slice of bread. Orange juice was freshly squeezed which I loved but 5 euros for a small glass of it.

Name: Libertine Comptoir de Cuisine
Review Text:
Best coffee in Amsterdam.
I had the salmon and horseradish toast, absolutely delicious. The sides in the lunch menu are very generous portions. Staff is very attentive and pleasant.

Name: Libertine Comptoir de Cuisine
Review Text: Delicious food & coffee! But the french toast was a bit overpriced... you only get one slice of bread which I think is not much for 6/7 euros.

Name: Libertine Comptoir de Cuisine
Review Text: Amazing sweet French toasts. A must try

Name: Libertine Comptoir de Cuisine
Review Text: Really good food, nice staff! But the portions are on the small side... When you're really hungry one little toast is not going to fix it for you haha

Name: Libertine Comptoir de Cuisine
Review Text: Horrible service! I had to go myself to take the menus after waiting for quite some time. Afterwards I had to go back to tell the waitress, which was busy texting, to please take our order. I never got my food and after long time I had to â€¦

Name: Libertine Comptoir de Cuisine
Review Text:
Perfect place, perfect food and super fantastic people!!!
Thank you very much...

Name: Libertine Comptoir de Cuisine
Review Text: The place looks nice and trendy. But the food was not so great, burned toast and waited for more than 30 minutes for just toast with fruit.

Name: Libertine Comptoir de Cuisine
Review Text: Went with the family. Friendly service and lovely food!

Name: Libertine Comptoir de Cuisine
Review Text: Good brunch spot. Love the curdy-creamy scramble eggs. French toast with mascarpone and nuts wasnt bad as well

Name: Libertine Comptoir de Cuisine
Review Text: It's got an authentic interior and delicious food. The staff was friendly and fast.

Name: Libertine Comptoir de Cuisine
